author: Staff Reporter
text:
Five juveniles were held for questioning, and sent to Kelly’s Government Observation Home on Friday for their alleged involvement in an attempted break-in at a home on Munswamy Street at Ekkatuthangal.

Police said the juveniles were seen breaking the lock at the house of Rajendran, who was with his pregnant wife at a hospital for delivery. The police were alerted by Rajendran’s father. The Guindy Police questioned the boys, who confessed to their crime.
title: Break-in attempt: juveniles quizzed
